    Was asked recently why I started The Cryptoconomy Podcast:
    • I wanted audio of the 1000s of amazing #Bitcoin articles
    • I realized most only read title & 1st paragraph (caught myself doing it)
    • The scope of Bitcoin study feels insurmountable w/out helphttps://t.co/umoiK05Ijz

    — Guy Swann⚡ (@TheCryptoconomy) April 19, 2019

    @TheCryptoconomy
